SELECT department_id, SUM( total_waybill_quantity ) AS y, SUM( complete_waybill_quantity ) AS z FROM dept_order_daily WHERE enabled = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT( report_time, "%Y-%m_%d" ) = DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( curdate( ), INTERVAL 1 DAY ), "%Y-%m_%d" )
AND DATE_FORMAT( report_time, "%Y-%m" ) = DATE_FORMAT( curdate( ), "%Y-%m" )
GROUP BY department_id ORDER BY y DESC, z DESC LIMIT 10

select report_time as x, sum(CASE WHEN goods_type in(1,2) THEN goods_weight ELSE goods_quantity END) as y from dept_order_daily where goods_type =#{productType} and report_time between #{strStartDate} and #{strEndDate} group by report_time order by report_time desc
select '' as name, sum(CASE WHEN goods_type in(1,2) THEN goods_weight ELSE goods_quantity END) as value from dept_order_daily where goods_type =#{productType} and report_time = #{strEndDate}
